sources.title: Border Patrol
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

metadata.Plot: Hoppy, California and Johnny are Texas Rangers trying to end a scheme which smuggles Mexicans into the United States to become essentially slaves in a silver mine owned by Orestes Krebs. The three are captured, sentenced to hang, and then escape. They free the slaves and capture the bad guys.
metadata.Actors: William Boyd, Andy Clyde, Jay Kirby
